name: Marketwire
overview: Marketwire, Inc. distributes press releases and news announcements to journalists, analysts, and professionals in the United States, Canada, and Europe. It offers public relations workflow solution, which organize newsroom that includes photo galleries, email alerts, online media kits, manage media and custom lists, distribute press releases, and auto-publish them to Website, and track releases; and investor relations workflow solution that have releases, filings, photos, and videos posted to investor relations Website. The company offers distribution services, which include geographic distribution, trade media, specialty markets, custom distribution, regulatory filing, and language translation; and multimedia services that include photo options, embedded video and links, search engine optimization, social media, conference calling, Webcasting, and broadcast services. Its services also include media management, which include media database, custom database, and media directory; and monitoring services that include online news monitoring, personal news monitoring, market news monitoring, and RSS feeds. The company was formerly known as Internet Wire and changed its name to Market Wire, Inc. in 2002. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in El Segundo, California. As of April 3, 2006, Marketwire, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Marketwire Canada.
